channel.title: How Do I make so admin can send server message?
channel.description: I was on the real runescape one day and when an update came it said that the server was being updated in... is there a way where i can set it so owner or admin can send a serverwide message that is somewhat like that?

item.title: How Do I make so admin can send server message?
item.dc:creator: @Bigbucks Bigbucks
item.description:
@Bigbucks wrote:

But how do i make it say like “Server shutting Down for night”[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 03:47:25 pm[/size][hr][quote=“primadude, post:4, topic:224499”] if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

You do it like ::update 60.

That would make it last for 60 seconds, until the server shutsdown for the update.[/quote]

where do i put that…my source is funscap3

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I make so admin can send server message?

item.title: How Do I make so admin can send server message?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

You do it like ::update 60.

That would make it last for 60 seconds, until the server shutsdown for the update.

Read full topic
